name.baseName: 生物乙醇 ; 碱法处理 ; 收集与运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset characterizes the life cycle of bioethanol from the collection and transportation phase through to pretreatment, focusing on the alkali method. It is applicable to various technological configurations within the bioethanol production industry. Moreover, this dataset aids in understanding the environmental impacts associated with the combustion of bioethanol in vehicles, as it includes LCI data for the process named 'Combustion of bioethanol in car' obtained from the GREET database.
该数据集描述了从收集和运输阶段到预处理阶段的生物乙醇生命周期，重点关注碱法。它适用于生物乙醇生产行业内的各种技术配置。此外，该数据集有助于了解与车辆燃烧生物乙醇相关的环境影响，因为它包括了从GREET数据库获得的名为“汽车燃烧生物乙醇”的过程的LCI数据。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Through data quality evaluation, 141 datasets with high completeness and consistency were selected from the reported 561 datasets in 474 published papers and classified into eight technological configurations determined by the pretreatment technology. The technological steps following pretreatment were all the same, although actual flows and parameter values vary, as observed in the literature
通过数据质量评估，从474篇已发表论文的561个数据集中选择了141个具有高完整性和一致性的数据集，并将其分类为由预处理技术确定的8种技术配置。预处理后的技术步骤都是相同的，尽管实际流量和参数值在文献中观察到不同
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset characterizes the life cycle of bioethanol from the collection and transportation phase through to pretreatment, focusing on the alkali method. It is applicable to various technological configurations within the bioethanol production industry. Moreover, this dataset aids in understanding the environmental impacts associated with the combustion of bioethanol in vehicles, as it includes LCI data for the process named 'Combustion of bioethanol in car' obtained from the GREET database.
该数据集描述了从收集和运输阶段到预处理阶段的生物乙醇生命周期，重点关注碱法。它适用于生物乙醇生产行业内的各种技术配置。此外，该数据集有助于了解与车辆燃烧生物乙醇相关的环境影响，因为它包括了从GREET数据库获得的名为“汽车燃烧生物乙醇”的过程的LCI数据。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Global datasets were used where possible, since the study does not apply to any specific region. LCI data for one external process named “Combustion of bioethanol in car” were obtained from the GREET database
在可能的情况下使用了全球数据集，因为该研究不适用于任何特定地区。一种名为“汽车中生物乙醇燃烧”的外部过程的LCI数据来自GREET数据库
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: We assessed the robustness of the modeling results through uncertainty propagation (Monte Carlo), discernibility analysis, global sensitivity analysis, and scenario variation.
我们通过不确定性传播（蒙特卡罗）、可辨别性分析、全局敏感性分析和场景变化评估了建模结果的鲁棒性。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, users should note that global datasets were prioritized over region-specific information. The robustness of the data should be taken into account during analysis, and users are encouraged to utilize the included uncertainty and sensitivity analyses such as Monte Carlo, discernibility analysis, and scenario variation to corroborate their findings. Furthermore, users should ensure that they account for the specific methodological considerations associated with recycling, use phase behavior, or technological applicability as outlined in the data pertaining to 'Combustion of bioethanol in car'.
在使用这个数据库进行生命周期评估时，用户应注意，全球数据集比特定区域的信息更受优先考虑。在分析过程中应考虑数据的稳健性，并鼓励用户使用包括蒙特卡洛、可识别性分析和情景变化等不确定性和敏感性分析来支持他们的发现。此外，用户应确保他们考虑了与“汽车燃烧生物乙醇”相关的数据中概述的特定方法论考虑，如回收、使用阶段行为或技术适用性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
